name: Catastrophe (curtainabuse)
description:
Control 4 elderly ladies with mental problems who think that cats are falling from the sky and want to rightfully return them to the cat paradise in the sky.

ZXCV to play.

I made this game just to boost my confidence in coding audio as that is what I hope to do some point in the future.

Thank you for taking a look at my visual novel.

Font - http://www.dafont.com/grandmas-garden.font

Meow- https://freesound.org/people/Npeo/sounds/203121/
